mapper.select: SELECT USEREMAIL, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(USERREGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS USERREGDATE, DECODE(ISSNS, 1, 'YES', 0, 'NO') AS ISSNS FROM USERS

SELECT USEREMAIL, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(USERREGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS USERREGDATE, DECODE(ISSNS, 1, 'YES', 0, 'NO') AS ISSNS, NVL(PHONE,'-') AS PHONE, NVL(USERNATION,'-') AS USERNATION, NVL(ZIPCODE,'-') AS ZIPCODE, NVL(ADDRESS1,'-') AS ADDRESS1, NVL(ADDRESS2,'-') AS ADDRESS2, NVL(CITY,'-') AS CITY, NVL(COUNTRY,'-') AS COUNTRY, NVL(REGION,'-') AS REGION FROM USERS WHERE USEREMAIL=#{userEmail}

SELECT P.IMP_UID as Pimp_Uid, P.TOTALAMOUNT as PtotalAmount, P.RECEIPT_URL as Preceipt_url, TO_CHAR(P.PAID_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as Ppaid_At, CASE WHEN P.REWARDNUM = 0 THEN '' ELSE (SELECT RK.REWARDSUBJECT FROM REWARDS_KO RK WHERE P.REWARDNUM = RK.REWARDNUM) END RrewardSubject, CL.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT as CcampaignSubject, C.CAMPAIGNIMG as CcampaignImg FROM PAYMENTS P, CAMPAIGNS_KO CL, Campaigns C WHERE P.USEREMAIL = #{userEmail} AND P.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME AND P.CAMPAIGNNAME = CL.CAMPAIGNNAME

SELECT U.USERNAME AS USERNAME, U.USEREMAIL AS USEREMAIL, NVL(U.USERNATION,'-') AS USERNATION, D.PHONE AS PHONE, D.ZIPCODE AS ZIPCODE, D.ADDRESS1 AS ADDRESS1, D.ADDRESS2 AS ADDRESS2, NVL(D.CITY,'-') AS CITY, NVL(D.REGION,'-') as REGION, NVL(D.COUNTRY,'-') AS COUNTRY, NVL(D.NOTE,'-') AS NOTE FROM DELIVERY D, USERS U WHERE D.IMP_UID=#{imp_uid} AND U.USEREMAIL = #{userEmail}
SELECT RECEIPT_URL, TOTALAMOUNT, SHIPPINGAMOUNT, REWARDNUM FROM PAYMENTS WHERE IMP_UID=#{imp_uid}

SELECT C.CAMPAIGNNAME AS CAMPAIGNNAME, CK.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT AS CAMPAIGNSUBJECT, C.FUNDINGUSERCNT AS FUNDINGUSERCNT, C.GATHERAMOUNT AS GATHERAMOUNT, C.CAMPAIGNREGISTER AS CAMPAIGNREGISTER, TO_CHAR(C.CAMPAIGNREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CAMPAIGNREGDATE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(C.DUEDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AS DUEDATE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(C.LAUNCHDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AS LAUNCHDATE FROM CAMPAIGNS C, CAMPAIGNS_KO CK WHERE CK.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME ORDER BY C.CAMPAIGNREGDATE DESC

SELECT C.CAMPAIGNNAME AS CAMPAIGNNAME, KO.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT AS KOCAMPAIGNSUBJECT, EN.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT AS ENCAMAPIGNSUBJECT, CH.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT AS CHCAMAPIGNSUBJECT, KO.CAMPAIGNSUMMARY AS KOCAMPAIGNSUMMARY, EN.CAMPAIGNSUMMARY AS ENCAMPAIGNSUMMARY, CH.CAMPAIGNSUMMARY AS CHCAMPAIGNSUMMARY, KO.CAMPAIGNCONTENTS AS KOCAMPAIGNCONTENTS, EN.CAMPAIGNCONTENTS AS ENCAMPAIGNCONTENTS, CH.CAMPAIGNCONTENTS AS CHCAMPAIGNCONTENTS, C.FUNDINGUSERCNT AS FUNDINGUSERCNT, C.GATHERAMOUNT AS GATHERAMOUNT, C.CAMPAIGNREGISTER AS CAMPAIGNREGISTER, C.YOUTUBECODE AS YOUTUBECODE, C.YOUTUBEIMG AS YOUTUBEIMG, C.CAMPAIGNIMG AS CAMPAIGNIMG, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(C.DUEDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AS SYSTODUEDATE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(C.LAUNCHDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AS SYSTOLAUNCHDATE, TO_CHAR(C.DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DUEDATE, TO_CHAR(C.LAUNCHDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAUNCHDATE FROM CAMPAIGNS C, CAMPAIGNS_KO KO, CAMPAIGNS_EN EN, CAMPAIGNS_CH CH WHERE C.CAMPAIGNNAME= #{campaignName} AND KO.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME AND EN.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME AND CH.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME

SELECT R.CAMPAIGNNAME AS CAMPAIGNNAME, R.REWARDAMOUNT AS REWARDAMOUNT, R.REWARDTOTALCNT AS REWARDTOTALCNT, R.REWARDCURRENTCNT AS REWARDCURRENTCNT, R.REWARDIMG AS REWARDIMG, RK.REWARDSUBJECT AS KOREWARDSUBJECT, RK.REWARDCONTENTS AS KOREWARDCONTENTS, RE.REWARDSUBJECT AS ENREWARDSUBJECT, RE.REWARDCONTENTS AS ENREWARDCONTENTS, RC.REWARDSUBJECT AS CHREWARDSUBJECT, RC.REWARDCONTENTS AS CHREWARDCONTENTS FROM REWARDS R, REWARDS_KO RK, REWARDS_EN RE, REWARDS_CH RC WHERE R.CAMPAIGNNAME = #{campaignName} AND R.REWARDNUM = #{rewardNum} AND RK.REWARDNUM = #{rewardNum} AND RE.REWARDNUM = #{rewardNum} AND RC.REWARDNUM = #{rewardNum}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO REWARDS VALUES( SEQ_REWARDS.NEXTVAL, #{campaignName}, #{rewardAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rewardTotalCnt, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rewardCurrentCnt, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rewardImg})
SELECT SEQ_REWARDS.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REWARDS_KO VALUES(#{idx} , #{rewardKoSubject}, #{rewardKoContents_editor}) INTO REWARDS_EN VALUES(#{idx} , #{rewardEnSubject}, #{rewardEnContents_editor}) INTO REWARDS_CH VALUES(#{idx} , #{rewardChSubject}, #{rewardChContents_editor}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
